lexUnit.name: confiscate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: take or seize (property) with authority

sentence.text: He had confiscated the journal , but he could not confiscate what was in Ben 's head .
Their action in confiscating certain lordships from her was not only in unjust , wrote the pope , but contrary to the customs of the court of Býarn .
